name: atomic-agents
description: An autonomous AI engineering team that can understand, plan, build, review, and evaluate code changes
author: danvoulez

scripts.build:all: pnpm rust:build && pnpm napi:build && pnpm build
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d postgres
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm rust:build && pnpm napi:build && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:migrate
scripts.test:l2: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && vitest run packages/**/tests/l2/** && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:l3: docker compose -f docker-compose.l3.yml up -d && node testing/l3/runner.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.l3.yml down
scripts.test:l4: docker compose -f docker-compose.l3.yml up -d && node testing/l4/adversarial-runner.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.l3.yml down
scripts.test:journeys: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && vitest run --config vitest.config.journeys.ts && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:l0 && pnpm test:l1 && pnpm test:l2
